name: Impermanence
description:
Impermanence is a traditional arcade shooter game inspired by musings on existentialism and hopes to serve as a short meditative experience.

Embrace the impermanence of it all by moving with the arrow keys or the mouse.

(Works also with Xbox 360 controller, use the left stick for movement and use the A button to select.)

Impermanence, also called Anicca or Anitya, is one of the essential doctrines and a part of three marks of existence in Buddhism. The doctrine asserts that all of conditioned existence, without exception, is "transient, evanescent, inconstant".
